Reviews.Title: “Great for Business Trip in Toronto”
Reviews.Author: Kevin C
Reviews.Content: Traveled for business. Hotel is clean. Staff offered great service. Rooms are quiet and modern. Breakfast was good and food was fresh. The hotel is located near an Irish Pub (5 minutes walk) witch might be interesting after the business conferences and meeting for a team build up. Overall experience was great but prices are over estimated for what you have in this kind of hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nearly perfect”
Reviews.Author: Marv1nM
Reviews.Content: I've been coming to this area for years now on business and have stayed at several other places in the neighborhood. This is my new favorite now. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the room I got and at such a great price. It was well appointed and immaculate. The staff were courteous and helpful. The free wireless internet, airport shuttle and the amazingly good breakfast were most pleasant surprises. I will be happy to return here.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hampton property”
Reviews.Author: 9mmforever
Reviews.Content: To be clear, I am a Hampton fan. I like their hotels as they are consistently great and worth the small premium over other mid-line hotels. This one is no exception. Pretty new property, the staff was very friendly (thanks again for arranging the shuttle, Heidi), room was very quiet, clean and comfortable and the breakfast was good. Only word of caution I would give is make sure if you use the hotel airport shuttle, use the right one. There are more than 1 Hampton near Pearson Airport and you could inadvertently find yourself on the wrong bus! Make sure you get on the Hampton Corporate Center shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Eddy827
Reviews.Content: Starting with airport pick up, the service is really great, rooms are confortable, breakfast is really good as well. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Terrific Value in a new, clean, modern hotel”
Reviews.Author: stonedrift
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were visiting friends in west Toronto for the weekend and drove down a day early to shop. Stayed Thursday evening in this hotel and would definitely stay again. Excellent value, friendly helpful staff and free internet. Breakfast is included. The rooms are large and modern with comfortable beds, linens and choice of feather or foam pillows! This is the third Hampton Inn we've stayed in lately and are very pleased with the experience every time.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, new, great value”
Reviews.Author: Gabriel M
Reviews.Content: An excellent Hampton Inn conveniently located just south of the airport, but near (20 minute drive) to downtown. The room was very clean, breakfast was pretty good for free, coffee always available. Great value. Only complaint was that there was no hot tub/jacuzzi, only a pool and the water was slightly cool for me.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: ducky77
Reviews.Content: We only stayed here one night and it was perfect. Staff were friendly and answered all my questions. Clean and a well organized hotel. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “why stay anywhere else? (update)”
Reviews.Author: AmberK
Reviews.Content: A second stay at the Hampton Inn in the last month. Again excellent value. Clean, spacious room with a walk in shower (instead of a tub), comfortable bed and nice and quiet. I hadn't noticed on my last visit that there is a coin laundry available nor had I mentioned the very reasonably equipped exercise room. The breakfast (if you stick to toast, cereal and fruit) is good. Check in and Check out was fast and pleasant. You can spend a lot more money for similar (or not even as good) accommodation in the airport area, but really, why would you? BTW there are two excellent restaurants less than a block away in a strip mall (same side of the street) called Spoon and Fork (Thai) and Prince Japanese Steakhouse. I strongly recommend both of these establishments for the excellent and reasonably priced food.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, stylish, comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: haparev
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a conference. I called the shuttle from Pearson. It appears to be a little further from the airport (maybe 10 minutes by shuttle), but still very convenient. It is on a street with many restaurant options. Michele's is a very nice Italian restaurant just one hotel over. The hotel is clearly new. Even the carpets are a great color and pattern, and different from the hallway to the bedroom. The beds are quite comfortable, as is the furniture. The TV is nice and big. The bathroom is large and very nice, with a large stylish vanity i would like to have in my house and a very large shower. I actually like showers without bathtubs, so was glad to see that. There is a lot of storage (little drawers and shelves everywhere) so it feels very homey. The meeting spaces are nice - well-appointed, with the stylish carpet and windows. The business center is small but efficient, and all the equipment works. The 24-hour market inside the hotel with snacks and toiletries has a decent supply. I got in late and was able to find a frozen vegetarian dinner. The staff let me use the microwave in the breakfast area. Breakfast is good for a hotel, and the 24-hour coffee/tea service is great. They even leave fruit out. The wireless internet signal throughout is nice and strong. And I love free internet that is also pretty fast. Overall, I would definitely stay here again. It is so nice and comfortable. The staff are helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “good value, clean and fresh”
Reviews.Author: Ottawalovethesouth
Reviews.Content: Came here this past weekened for kid's hockey tournament. They were very accomodating, especially when we did some team building games in teh common area and we were pretty noisy. About the only detail that would be a negative is that the phone was broken in our room, after we mentioned it, the problem was remedied within hours. I would stay here again for sure.

Reviews.Title: “For the money, you can't beat this newer hotel”
Reviews.Author: jamjude
Reviews.Content: We arrived at Pearson at midnight, called the hotel, they sent the shuttle, we were settled in and in bed by 1:00am. The room had one king size very comfortable bed and an enormous shower, (no bathtub). The staff were very helpful. The breakfast was included and I'd rate it a 4 out of 5 for variety and freshness. In the morning, we took the shuttle back to the airport. (The night shuttle driver told us to book it when we checked in, which we did.) Not as close to the airport as some, but for the money, you can't beat this newer hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good deal for a clean room and comfortable bed.”
Reviews.Author: BDAONE
Reviews.Content: Close to the airport, room was clean and modern. Bed was very comfortable and it was quite. Biggest downside was no redressing but there are avfew a 5 minute walk down the road.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: TrekFan1969
Reviews.Content: Very, very nice hotel - friendly staff. A special thank you to Melanie from the front desk for attending to even the smallest details quickly and with a smile. Someone give that woman a raise. :)

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stop at”
Reviews.Author: Cecilia M
Reviews.Content: I really ejoyed thier service; the rooms were very clean. I travel alot and I look forward to my next stay at this hotel :)

Reviews.Title: “Close to the airport and service with a smile.”
Reviews.Author: Vasie_Birdy
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were in transit from Calgary to New York and stopped in Toronto for 36 hours to see Niagara Falls. We chose this hotel as it had a free shuttle from the airport (but not too close), was virtually on the main road out to Niagara Falls and, looked clean and tidy from the pictures on the website - we were correct on all points! In addition, we were very pleased to be greeted and fare-welled by extremely friendly and helpful staff (among the best!!!), and found the rooms to be very generous in size, comfort and extras - king size bed, writing desk and office chair, free wireless internet, spacious bathroom, LARGE flat screen TV, refrigerator etc. Breakfast was complimentary and was significantly more than just a few bits and pieces - great value. A couple of points to note: The airport shuttle arrangement was confusing as there are many many Hilton hotels in Toronto and the website gives no indication of where to go (Bay S5), the signage at the airport was unhelpful and the airport courtesy phone didn't list this hotels contact details. Also, the A/C was a little noisy, no hot-tub/spa/jacuzzi and no room service - upon arrival at ~21:30 we really didn't want to go out for food, however there are 2 or 3 restaurants ~5 minutes walk. Oh, but did I mention the service was outstanding and the rooms are excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Value and Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: wellrested2
Reviews.Content: We had a two day get away in Toronto and the hotel was wonderful on all accounts. Service was friendly and outstanding in every way. The bed was divine and the room was clean. A perfect stay. Only wish they had posted information on how to work the fridge (I'm not one that reads manuals). We ended up with iced wine instead of chilled!

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: MontrealIkra
Reviews.Content: Very clean, brand new, comfortable beds, spotless bathroom. My only concern is the breakfast - very mediocre. Good place to stay for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Worth going back to”
Reviews.Author: RHP_9
Reviews.Content: Spent 6 nights at the hotel. Check in was swift and professional. Room was spacious with a comfortable king size bed. Bathroom was spotless and was a walk in shower, no tub. Able to open a window to get in fresh air which was nice. Breakfast was included in the room rate and was very good. Lots of selection. The grab and go breakfast bag is average and not as good as having breakfast in the hotel. Cookies are available in the afternoon. The gym is good with all the necessary equipment one needs. Parking is free during your stay. Hotel was very quiet even with it being full. Did not hear any airplanes even though they fly over head at times. The hotel is very close to the airport, maybe a 10 minute drive. Within a 10-15 minute drive you are at Square One shopping mall or at the Kipling Subway station which takes you to down toewn Toronto. I noticed the Hampton Shuttle Van dropping people off at the subway station. I don't know if this is a servise they always offer. Shuttle to the airport is free. Staff is very accommodating. If I had one compaint I wish the towels would have been softer.

Reviews.Title: “Nice service”
Reviews.Author: Laurian755
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for three nights for sightseeing around Toronto. The hotel is nice. The only thing I was not happy with are the AC. It was very loud and I have to use earplugs. The pool is very small but the gym was great. The location next to the airport is okay, and with car you will be in 25 min. directly in the city. Parking costs 25$, but was the cheapest way to come directly into the city.

Reviews.Title: “great for business trips”
Reviews.Author: istee
Reviews.Content: close to airport...though there are many hilton hotels...so its a bit tough to find...but the hotel has a shuttel service for pick up and drop. so do use it. The rooms are very comfortable with internet and tv and microwave. The breakfast is much better than many budget business hotels. you may not get eggs on demand...but the eggs served were tasty and warm enough for me. you can make your own waffles in the waffle maker too :) all through the day there is coffee and cookies and fruits kept out for the guests and it is complimentary. the staff is extremely polite and helpful. i was very impressed with the front office staff...

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Experience”
Reviews.Author: Oldlywedz
Reviews.Content: Everything about our experience at the Hampton Inn Airport Corp. Center was wonderful. We were flying to Ottawa and the hotel offers a package deal that allows you to leave your car there when flying and they shuttle you to and from the airport. The rooms were great - we particularly liked the large, clean, well lit bathroom. The breakfast was wonderful with a great selection. Even with a big crowd for what was a holiday weekend in Canada, all the choices were promptly replenished. Our experience was made even better by an excellent staff deeply committed to customer service. In particular, Heidi and Matt really go the extra mile to make sure everything is good for their guests. We had lots of questions and made various changes to our plans and they handled it all very kindly and professionally. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Toronto area.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: familyroadtripper
Reviews.Content: The Hampton Inn Corporate Centre near the Toronto Airport was an excellent hotel. The grounds, public areas, and room were all modern and spotless. The pool and weight room seemed very nice although we never used them. There was a little convenience store in the lobby that sold snacks and some medicines, and it was, well, very convenient! The free breakfast was excellent with a variety of options from fruit and cereal for the more health-conscious, all the way up to omelettes and breakfast meats for those who are, let's just say, less concerned with watching their diet! :) The staff was polite, efficient, and accommodating. Everytime we called the front desk to set a wake-up call or I walked by on our way to the car, the front-desk staff always called us by name. Some earlier reviews complained about the lack of restaurants in the area, but I think this was a bit overstated. There was a fabulous tepanyaki Japanese Steakhouse one block away in a shopping center with several other restaurants available including a Chinese restaurant, and Italian restaurant, and a pub. There were several other restaurants within a short drive of the hotel, and downtown Mississauga with the large Square One Shopping Center is only ten minutes away. In fact, the hotel is only a 20 minute drive from downtown Toronto. My only complaint was that the cable TV in the room was unreliable and rather limited, but since we were out and about in one of North America's most exciting cities, it was only a small inconvenience. Overall, I would recommend the Hampton Inn!

Reviews.Title: “Great !”
Reviews.Author: medicman24
Reviews.Content: very nice contemporary room, comfortable beds with pillow menu, wich was nice, newer furnishings and electronics wich functioned very well, sage in wall nice asset, very convenient continental breakfast and very helpful staff as well as a limo to airport when ever needed., all around very decent stay thanks Hilton

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, just what we were looking for from an Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cargoodrich
Reviews.Content: My wife and I arrived into Toronto and checked out from the airport at about 9pm, so we just needed a nearby airport hotel to stay for the evening before continuing our honeymoon the following day. It was so convenient to catch a quick transfer bus from the Airport arrivals straight to the hotel, included as part of our stay. This hotel was a great start to our honeymoon. The room was lovely and we really enjoyed the breakfast buffet in the morning. The bacon in particular was fantastic! Bit noisy in the morning with lots of people requesting wake-up phone calls and door knocking, but we expected this with it being an airport hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it- all you need in an airport hotel.”
Reviews.Author: SunnyNow
Reviews.Content: From the moment of our arrival, we could not have felt more welcome. The front desk staff are friendly, helpful and very efficient - nothing was too much trouble. The hotel itself is very clean and nicely decorated and laid-out. Our room was tastefully appointed, spotlessly clean and had everything you would need, including a microwave. As earlier reviewers have noted, the complimentary breakfast is very good, featuring many food items you would not expect in a free breakfast - much appreciated before our long flight home. The airport shuttle was punctual, and the driver helpful and friendly, and it was only a ten-minute ride to the airport. We stayed at several hotels during our two-week stay in Ontario- this was amongst the best. We'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay over for air connections”
Reviews.Author: Traveller3283
Reviews.Content: 5 Star clean and comfortable, Customer focused to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Shuttle Bus fills up fast, so make your reservation in advance to arrive at the airport in good time. Breakfast opens early, but even so you may request a Breakfast in a bag - wonderful concept.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for park, stay and go”
Reviews.Author: JWest52
Reviews.Content: Stayed overnight before our flight out of Pearson. I booked our room via internet. Check-in was very quick and friendly. Our room was around the corner from the elevator and was a little noisy, though it was quiet by the time we were ready to sleep. The beds were very comfortable. I thought it was a little odd for the coffee maker, etc. to be on the counter in the bathroom. When I inquired about the shuttle to the airport I was informed that I had to book a time in advance, so make sure you do when you check-in! Breakfast in the morning had more available than we expected and was quite good. The shuttle arrived at the exact time and delivered us promptly to the airport and assisted us with our bags. On our return I called the number on the business card that was given to me as soon as we retrieved our bags and the shuttle was there to pick us up after only a 5 min. wait outside. The parking lot for the park and go is on-site and well lit.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel...a little let down about location”
Reviews.Author: walaq64
Reviews.Content: Pros: About 20 mins drive from Pearson airportÂ  Good facilities in hotel:Â  Gym, swimming pool, breakfast room (complimentary breakfast), laundry room and mini hotel store Fridge and coffee maker in room Friendly staff, always willing to helpÂ  Shuttle bus to airport and within 5 mile radius from hotel Daily room service Wifi and free local calls Really, really comfy bed! And good size roomÂ  Cons: Absolutely nothing around the hotel, however there a few restaurants but no convienient store 30 minutes bus ride to nearest subway (islington) and about 30 mins to get to Toronto Room cleaning is good but be warned you could be waiting all day No microwave in the kingsize room Overall: great hotel, really comfortable stay. Staff are very helpful. Good fitness facilities within hotel and free breakfast every morning was fantastic! We will definitely stay at the Hampton inn again...but in an alternative location nearer to town. Â

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, service desk not helpful”
Reviews.Author: Smitty019
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my wife for one night and I'm glad it was only that. Rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. The breakfast was good with a good selection of food and the lady in charge of the breakfast was very nice and helpful. The downside... I ordered the "romance" package which for an added price includes wine or champagne, chocolates, keepsake glasses, and flowers. I expected to walk into the room with a nice presentation of all these things and I ended up getting nothing at all. I went down to the front desk only to find that they had NO flowers, NO wine or champagne, NO keepsake glasses, and you guessed it NO box of chocolates. To make up for this the person at the front desk gave me a bag of chocolate bars, mini bags of chips, apple juice, water, and some energy drinks HOW ROMANTIC!!!! He also changed my fee from a romance package to the standard rate, which is nice and all but hardly rectified the situation. We stayed on the 5th floor, one of the elevators smelled of cigarettes. The walls in our room were paper thin every time someone in another room around us flushed the toilet we could hear it and even worse when the man in the room next to us peed we could also hear that. I was woken up at 9am by someone taking a shower in one of the rooms around us... although I cannot blame in because the showers were very nice :) I must admit the prices were great but it would be nice to get what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: “Highly satisfactory experience”
Reviews.Author: LindyM
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff were extremely accommmodating and friendly. The hotel is clean and new and the facilities are excellent. Breakfast is very good. We had a small problem with some inconsiderate guests being noisy in the small hours of the morning (can happen anywhere unfortunately) but hotel management dealt with the problem very satisfactorily. GOOD WORK HAMPTON INN TORONTO AIRPORT CORPORATE CENTRE! We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Inviting, comfortable and friendly”
Reviews.Author: nothometoday
Reviews.Content: We booked a 2 night reward stay at this Hampton Inn, knowing that it was some distance from downtown. Public transportation and parking were within blocks if we opted to use them. Depending on time of day, the expressways provided quick access to & from downtown, while driving into Toronto via local neighborhoods was an interesting, multicultural treat! We wondered about dinner options, but the wonderful desk clerk suggested a lttle strip mall a few blocks down the street that had 5 restaurants, and we had great meals there in 2 of them. Getting back to that desk clerk. Anna is an amazing asset in this hotel. Her charm, smile, humor and helpfulness will be part of our memories from this trip! Gee, I hope someone at Hilton reads these! Our room was clean as could be, and felt so fresh. As usual, the Hampton Inn bed was very comfortable, and our stay was quiet and restful. Breakfast was standard Hampton Inn fare, which after 2 weeks on the road is predictable, but certainly adequate and with enough variety to satisfy for a quick and easy meal to get the day going. We would absolutely stay here again when we visit Toronto!

Reviews.Title: “Luxurious And Cozy Nights Sleeps”
Reviews.Author: EricaJ3
Reviews.Content: This hotel was really nice and warm. Big warm bed and a good night sleep. Abit on the expensive side though, but it was very nice place and excellent customer service. The bathroom was very nice and clean, I was impressed.

Reviews.Title: “Just what the doctor ordered....GREAT BED.”
Reviews.Author: Vikingbymarriage
Reviews.Content: Awesome hotel. Great room. Nice decor. GREAT BED. Would love to know what type of mattress they use. Had best night sleep in a while. Big puffy comforter. Nice LCD tv.....was just was weary traveler needed. Love, love, loved it.

Reviews.Title: “Had a wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: SFink75
Reviews.Content: Very nice clean hotel. Spacious room. Very comfy bed. Excellent & pleasant service. Nice hot breakfast included. Front Desk very helpful whenever I had any questions / requests.

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: wakus2009
Reviews.Content: Not all that great. The front desk could do better. There was a particular person that was a lot horrible. He was always quick to dismiss me whenever I came down to ask a question. Maybe it had to do with colour.Not so sure I would ever return to the hotel. But must say that the environs/rooms were clean . But it was far from all attractions. If I had not booked the whole duration,I would have been more than happy to check out the next day. Anyway,the staff left a sour taste,my experience of Canada was spoilt by them.

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service”
Reviews.Author: 2livelovelaughtravel
Reviews.Content: We booked this on a points stay so it was a little distance from downtown and of course parking/driving downtown was a super pain, but outside from this, the hotel could not be better. The housekeeping staff, Very very friendly. Some of the hotel front desk staff were a little more friendlier than others. The breakfast was the bomb! and they served different items each day on the hot bar. The lady in charge of breakfast even did a "last call" type of thing before shutting it down. Very nice, we thought. the rooms were more than adequate in size (we had a king study), very clean as well.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Brand New Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Katrina_Schipul
Reviews.Content: Working in the hospitality industry myself, I have very high expectations for the hotels I stay at and this Hampton Inn far surpassed my standards! Beautiful property - wonderfully decorated with modern decor, rooms very spacious and fresh, and front desk staff very welcoming and helpful. I definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Toronto area. Just a bit of advice - skip dinner at Mario's, the "Italian" restaurant that is within walking distance of the hotel. You won't regret it ;)

Reviews.Title: “Brand New - Nice staff and design”
Reviews.Author: Viajero-Colombiano
Reviews.Content: Hotel is brand new. Very, very beautiful. Its decoration is modern, warm. Very clean. Front desk people is amazing. Kind, warm, polite. Congratulations to them. Gym and pool are good for the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: AnasHnil
Reviews.Content: As an Inn, this hotel is far more than my expectation. Free LAN and Wi-Fi access, nice rooms (I love the beds), and the basic needs are served as more than a joy! The attitude of staffs are good. But the business centre are a little bit small.

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Treat”
Reviews.Author: NBHabsfan
Reviews.Content: I was travelling with my 16 year old son & booked a room here for a night using some reward points as they had a promotion on that would only use half the normal points. It appears to be brand new, & was real handy for us for getting onto the 401. We were driving in from the US, so came in off the 403 & was only a couple of minutes down the road. The reception we received was excellent, & the room was great! I've had experiences with some reward programs where they put you far far down the halls in budget type rooms, but we were right around the corner from the elevator as is my preference, & even had a personalized letter awaiting us in the room along with a bottle of water & package of cookies. Room had 2 queen size beds, a microwave & bar size fridge which was handy for us as we were on a road trip & were able to rechill our water bottles & soft drinks for repacking in to our cooler bag the next morning. The breakfast room is quite spacious, & well appointed (unlike most breakfast rooms I've experienced), you wouldn't even mind hanging out there in the evening if there was a group of you. The breakfast was very good, small omelettes & great little sausage links the morning we were there, + a large fruit bowl of melon, pineapple, etc., (a noticable upgrade from the Holiday Inn Express breakfasts we'd had the previous 2 mornings in another city). I really liked their robust coffee as well. The room was very cold when we entered, (67 degrees) but with the handy electronic wall thermostat, I just set it to 72 & bingo, we were comfortable in minutes. Bathroom was large, marble type floors & walls, plenty of towels available in a nice presentation. The TV was bigger then what you normally see in a breakfast included type room, (at least a 40"). They have done a great job with this place, i recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: “Highy recommended”
Reviews.Author: carla_summerfield
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at this hotel near Toronto's International Airport . Spacious and comfortable rooms, good service , and the location was convenient to our business meetings near the Airport. Hotel offers many complimentary services such as breakfast, internet, parking, airport shuttle . Great value and no surprises in the bill. There is a golf course view from the hotel ...request a higher floor ...it is amazing.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT! A+”
Reviews.Author: MichelleFlower
Reviews.Content: For a brand new hotel, they sure know how to impress. Everything was as expected, I've stayed at many Hampton Inn's, and I like the consistency. No surprises. Which is perfect! The room was amazing, a lot better looking than most Hampton's and its better than the Airport because this one is closer to restaurants/downtown. I would suggest to make sure the coffee/tea is always replenished it ran out after I poured mine. I don't think anyone came to replace it afterward, didn't bother telling the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Stay”
Reviews.Author: JamesOrlin
Reviews.Content: Great Hotel. The GM helped me with everything. When I arrived all my luggage, materials and documents were ready for me in my room. Comfortable stay, everything was as expected. Nice new looking hotel (I may try the fitness centre next time).

Reviews.Title: “Tense Moments”
Reviews.Author: ronwood
Reviews.Content: Eleven girls from our hockey team were trapped in the elevator for 45 minutes. The hotel had no organized protocall, on duty staff did not even know were keys were kept for elevator control panel. Compenstion for inconveniece and mental stress on players / parents was a joke, $20.00 off a nights stay. Thanks for your understanding our frustration. Good thing nothing serious happened to our kids.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Toronto Airport Corporate Centre
HotelInfo.Address: 5515 Eglinton Avenue West, Toronto, Ontario M9C 5K5, Canada
